m_szDocTitle: Didi eyes bigger share of ODM market | Shanghai Daily
m_szDocSumamry: Didi eyes bigger share of ODM market Source: Xinhua |                                          May 26, 2016, Thursday                                          | Online Edition Cheng Wei, founder of on-demand mobility (ODM) service Didi Chuxing, outlined the company's expansion plan for the coming years, citing electric cars and research into driverless vehicles. Didi has amassed 14 million registered drivers worldwide since it was founded about four year ago, said Cheng, during the ongoing "China Big Data Industry Summit & China E-commerce Innovation and Development Summit" in Guiyang, capital
